mdRecord.dcterms:title: Copy photograph - King George VI and Queen Elizabeth at Mount Vernon, June 9, 1939
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lamb, William Harrison, 1889-1944
Marler, Howard B. (copy photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: George VI, King of Great Britain, 1895-1952
Elizabeth, Queen, consort of George VI, King of Great Britain, 1900-2002
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white copy photograph made by Howard Marler, July 1970. Copy of a photograph taken by W. H. Lamb during the visit of King George and Queen Elizabeth at Mount Vernon on June 9, 1939. The King and Queen walk with Mrs. Towner, Regent for the Mount Vernon Ladies' Association followed by First Lady Eleanor Roosevelt and members of the royal party.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
